mapper.select: /** 관리자의 통신사 신청정보 상세 (selectApplyDetail)**/ SELECT A.* , (SELECT BIZ_NET_SERVICE FROM BIZ_NETWORK WHERE BIZ_ID = A.BIZ_ID AND NET_NO = '1' AND ROWNUM = '1') AS KT_NET_SERVICE , (SELECT BIZ_NET_SERVICE FROM BIZ_NETWORK WHERE BIZ_ID = A.BIZ_ID AND NET_NO = '2' AND ROWNUM = '1') AS SKT_NET_SERVICE , (SELECT BIZ_NET_SERVICE FROM BIZ_NETWORK WHERE BIZ_ID = A.BIZ_ID AND NET_NO = '3' AND ROWNUM = '1') AS LG_NET_SERVICE FROM BIZ A WHERE A.BIZ_ID = #{bizId}
/** 관리자의 통신사 요금제 리스트 (selectBizPlanList)**/ SELECT B.* FROM BIZ A INNER JOIN PLAN_TABLE B ON A.BIZ_NAME = B.BIZ_NAME WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZ_ID = #{bizId}
/** 관리자의 통신사 탈퇴정보 상세 (selectWithdrawalDetail)**/ SELECT * FROM BIZ WHERE BIZ_ID = #{bizId}

/** 통신사 요금제 상세 정보 Ajax (selectBizPlanDetailAjax)**/ SELECT A.* , DECODE(A.NET_NO, '1', 'KT', '2', 'SKT', 'LGU+') AS NET_NAME , DECODE(A.GEN_NO, '1', '5G', '2', 'LTE', '3', '3G', 'LTE/3G') AS GEN_NAME FROM PLAN_TABLE A WHERE 1=1 AND PLAN_NO = #{plan_no}
